Articles.Content:
Hello! Recently I have been fiddling around with VTOLs, but couldn't ever get it to fly right. Thankfully, I had a breakthrough!

May I introduce the Lithium 1! It is a 3 engine VTOL that looks okay and seats 4 kerbals. The side pieces and the tiny cupolas at the back are from the Stockalike Base Parts mod.

It is actually pretty maneuverable and flies pretty well. Unless, of course, you are me.

The fact that I have a potato computer and am abysmal at flying VTOLs might have something to do with it.

Also, here's the download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/mpi9kpyov0ostkq/SC%20Dropship.craft?dl=0

Edited March 16, 2015 by Cobalt60

Here is the link for all that want to download it!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/mpi9kpyov0ostkq/SC%20Dropship.craft?dl=0

How did you get your navball to look like that?

P.S.

Nice VTOL.

It's probably from the pack of mods I installed, from the Renaissance pack of improvement mods. I don't know though, as I have used them for a long time.

Unless of course you mean the erratic angle after my crash was strange.
